org.xchain.framework.sax

Class XChainTemplatesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.sax.HandlerWrapper
      • org.xchain.framework.sax.XChainTemplatesHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.transform.sax.TemplatesHandler, SaxTemplatesHandler, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler

    public class XChainTemplatesHandler
extends HandlerWrapper
implements SaxTemplatesHandler
    This filter handles processing instructions. These can be used to style the contents of the xchain before it is loaded.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Josh Kennedy
